author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FRANCINE'S EYEWALL NEARING SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...300 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...FRANCINE'S EYEWALL NEARING SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...300 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 3:00 PM CDT Wed Sep 11
 the center of Francine was located near 28.9, -91.5
 with movement NE at 17 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 975 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.
